      • parsePreview

        private android.graphics.Bitmap parsePreview()
        Blocking method that fetches and scales the preview image.
        Note: if this item is a duplicate of another one (file paths match), then existing preview is used.

      • scaleDown

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap scaleDown(android.graphics.Bitmap realImage,
                                float maxSizePx)

      • determineExtensionType

        public static NavItem.Type determineExtensionType(java.io.File file)
        Based on the extension of a given file, will determine the type (AUDIO, VIDEO or PICTURE. This will be based on VALID_AUDIO_EXTENSIONS, VALID_VIDEO_EXTENSIONS and VALID_PICUTRE_EXTENSIONS. If the extension is unrecognized will return null.
        Parameters:
        file - file whose extension will be checked
        Returns:
        file the Type or null if the extension is not recognized

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Description copied from class: java.lang.Object
        Returns a string containing a concise, human-readable description of this object. Subclasses are encouraged to override this method and provide an implementation that takes into account the object's type and data. The default implementation is equivalent to the following expression: 
           getClass().getName() + '@' + Integer.toHexString(hashCode())

        See Writing a useful toString method if you intend implementing your own toString method.

        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
